column3: 2 add-1/8 cup shredded mozzarella to a bowl
1 add-1/4 tsp salt to a bowl
8 add-1/4 tsp pepper to a bowl
3 Slice-Slice two 1/2 inch thick rounds from a baguette (slice slanted
7 Toast-Toast both sides of the slices on the pan for 2 to 3 minutes until lightly charred and crispy and transfer the slices to a plate
6 Cut-Cut 1/4 cup of cherry tomatoes into halves
5 add-1/16 cup basil to a bowl
9 add-In a bowl, add the cut cherry tomatoes
10 Combine-Combine the contents of the bowl
11 Spoon-Spoon the mixture from the bowl onto the bread
